wikipedia_page.main: Bobby Reid (born 9 October 1955) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a central defender for St Mirren, making 145 appearances in the Scottish Football League between 1973 and 1980.

response: Vipond is a supporter of the Paisley based football club St Mirren, he became a supporter after Alex Ferguson, then St Mirren's manager brought Tony Fitzpatrick and Bobby Reid to his school to meet the pupils. He has presented souvenir videos for St Mirren.
*Bobby Decordova-Reid (born 1993), English professional footballer, previously known as Bobby Reid
